Production: Production on Boo! A Madea Halloween began in mid-January 2016 in Atlanta, Georgia. On March 4, 2016, Lionsgate released a teaser trailer for the film.[5]
starring: Tyler Perry|Bella Thorne|Cassi Davis|Patrice Lovely|Andre Hall|Yousef Erakat|Lexy Panterra|Diamond White|Liza Koshy|Brock O’Hurn|Jimmy Tatro|JC Caylen|Kian Lawley|Mike Tornabene|
Synopsis: Madea spends Halloween keeping an eye on a group of misbehaving teens and fending off killers, paranormal poltergeists, ghosts, ghouls and zombies.[3]
